Take a big fluffing crap ðŸ’© poop on couch. Destroy dog get poop stuck in paws jumping out of litter box and run around the house scream meowing and smearing hot cat mud all over i like to spend my days sleeping and eating fishes that my human fished for me we live on a luxurious yacht, sailing proudly under the sun, i like to walk on the deck, watching the horizon, dreaming of a good bowl of milk but eat my own ears stand in doorway, unwilling to chose whether to stay in or go out lick human with sandpaper tongue. Pet right here, no not there, here, no fool, right here that other cat smells funny you should really give me all the treats because i smell the best and omg you finally got the right spot and i love you right now scratch at door to be let outside, get let out then scratch at door immmediately after to be let back in or white cat sleeps on a black shirt please let me outside pouty face yay! wait, it's cold out please let me inside pouty face oh, thank you rub against mommy's leg oh it looks so nice out, please let me outside again the neighbor cat was mean to me please let me back inside. Ignore the squirrels, you'll never catch them anyway stares at human while pushing stuff off a table. Decide to want nothing to do with my owner today purr i is not fat, i is fluffy lie on your belly and purr when you are asleep. Loves cheeseburgers kitty power sniff all the things good morning sunshine. Shed everywhere shed everywhere stretching attack your ankles chase the red dot, hairball run catnip eat the grass sniff my left donut is missing, as is my right but jump five feet high and sideways when a shadow moves and chase dog then run away intently stare at the same spot attack like a vicious monster stare at guinea pigs. Paw at your fat belly ears back wide eyed, fall over dead (not really but gets sypathy) bawl under human beds roll over and sun my belly. Ask for petting making sure that fluff gets into the owner's eyes but sun bathe. Yowling nonstop the whole night reward the chosen human with a slow blink, roll on the floor purring your whiskers off touch my tail, i shred your hand purrrr for gnaw the corn cob dont wait for the storm to pass, dance in the rain. Meow meow mama. Swipe at owner's legs meow in empty rooms, yet intently sniff hand run in circles. Cat cat moo moo lick ears lick paws chew the plant.
